{hoge}).\n\nmain(_) ->\n  Test = #test{hoge=<<1,2>>}.\n```\n\n\u5b9f\u884c\u7d50\u679c:\n\n```\nprog.erl:4: syntax error before: '=<'\n```\n", "tags": ["Erlang"]}
